item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-04-27
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Hanging out @ Harvard Square waiting for @ckirsten to get out of class. (@ Cambridge, 1. (Harvard Square)) #
  • RT If a country hurt the US as bad as Wall Street has, we'd have attacked them with soldiers,Bruce Willis & a Transformer /via @capricecrane #
  • I'm at Harvard Coop (1400 Massachusetts Ave, at Brattle St, Cambridge). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
